title: 90/671/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 December 1990 on transitional measures applying to Portuguese imports from other member states of products of the pigmeat, egg and poultrymeat sectors (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 19 December  1990
on transitional measures applying to Portuguese imports from other Member States of products  of the pigmeat, egg and poultrymeat sectors
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(90/671/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is authorized to  apply from 1 January to 31 December 1991 the special duties indicated in Annexes I and II on  imports of the corresponding products from the other Member States.
This Decision is  addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L  362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 28.
(2)  OJ No L 362, 27. 12. 1990, p. 35.
